texts: Get in touch using the form below. We aim to reply within 10 working days.

We take feedback about our staff very seriously, so please provide as much detail as possible so we can investigate your issue. For privacy and staff confidentiality reasons we can't always give detailed feedback on the actions we take about individual employees.
Thank you for taking the time to complete and submit one of our online forms. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

On some occasions, we may need to share your information with bus operators for these purposes. Your personal information will be properly safeguarded and processed in accordance with the requirements of privacy and data protection legislation.
